/***************************************/ /* 모바일 광고상세 GetMobileAdDetail */ /***************************************/ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED SET NOCOUNT ON DECLARE @AD_CODE BIGINT = {0} ,@USER_ID NVARCHAR(50) = '{1}' ,@BOOKMARK_YN BIT = 0 ,@MANAGEMENT_URL NVARCHAR(100) = '{2}'
SELECT @BOOKMARK_YN= CASE WHEN COUNT(1) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM T_MEMBER A INNER JOIN T_MEMBER_BOOKMARK B On A.MEMBER_CODE = B.MEMBER_CODE AND B.AD_CODE = @AD_CODE WHERE A.USER_ID = @USER_ID
SELECT A.AD_CODE ,A.TITLE ,A.LOGO_URL ,CASE WHEN A.CONTENT_TYPE = 2 THEN @MANAGEMENT_URL +'/advertise/adsub?AD_CODE=' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), A.AD_CODE) ELSE @MANAGEMENT_URL + '/advertise/contentview/'+ CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), A.AD_CODE) END AS CONTENT_URL ,ISNULL(BOOKMARK_YN,0) AS BOOKMARK_YN ,ISNULL(FAVORITE_YN,0) AS FAVORITE_YN FROM T_AD A LEFT JOIN (SELECT AD_CODE , CONVERT(BIT, MAX(CASE WHEN BOOKMARK_KIND = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) AS BOOKMARK_YN , CONVERT(BIT, MAX(CASE WHEN BOOKMARK_KIND = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) AS FAVORITE_YN FROM T_MEMBER_BOOKMARK GROUP BY AD_CODE ) B ON A.AD_CODE = B.AD_CODE WHERE A.AD_CODE = @AD_CODE
UPDATE T_AD SET CLICK_CNT = ISNULL(CLICK_CNT,0) + 1 WHERE AD_CODE = @AD_CODE SET NOCOUNT OFF

/**************************************************/ /* 모바일 광고 검색리스트 GetMobileAdSearchList */ /*************************************************/ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED SET NOCOUNT ON DECLARE @PAGE_COUNT INT = {0} ,@PAGE INT = {1} ,@LATITUDE NUMERIC(20,16) = CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{2}') = 1 THEN '{2}' ELSE 37.5655905 END ,@LONGITUDE NUMERIC(20,16) = CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{3}') = 1 THEN '{3}' ELSE 126.9758364 END ,@UTC_DATE VARCHAR(8) = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), GETUTCDATE(),112) ,@UTC_TIME VARCHAR(5) = CONVERT(VARCHAR(5), GETUTCDATE(),108) ,@TIME_ZONE NUMERIC(5,0) = {4} /* 9시간 * 60분*/ ,@USER_ID NVARCHAR(100) = '{5}' ,@MNG_URL NVARCHAR(100) = '{6}'; WITH T_TABLE AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MIN(dbo.FN_TO_DISTANCE(@LATITUDE, @LONGITUDE, C.LATITUDE, C.LONGITUDE,'M'))) AS IDX ,A.AD_CODE ,A.TITLE ,A.SUB_TITLE ,B.COMPANY_NAME ,A.LOGO_URL ,A.BANNER_TYPE ,ISNULL(MIN(dbo.FN_TO_DISTANCE(@LATITUDE, @LONGITUDE, C.LATITUDE, C.LONGITUDE,'M')),0) AS DISTANCE ,ISNULL(MAX(REAL_AD_TYPE),1) AS REAL_AD_TYPE ,CONVERT(BIT, CASE WHEN A1.AD_CODE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) BOOKMARK_YN ,@MNG_URL + '/advertise/contentview/' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), A.AD_CODE) CONTENT_URL FROM T_AD A LEFT JOIN (SELECT A.AD_CODE FROM T_MEMBER_BOOKMARK A INNER JOIN T_MEMBER B ON A.MEMBER_CODE = B.MEMBER_CODE WHERE B.USER_ID = @USER_ID ) A1 ON A.AD_CODE = A1.AD_CODE INNER JOIN T_COMPANY B ON A.COMPANY_CODE = B.COMPANY_CODE INNER JOIN ( SELECT AD_CODE, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE,1 REAL_AD_TYPE FROM T_AD_PLACE UNION ALL SELECT A.AD_CODE, b.LATITUDE, B.LONGITUDE,2 REAL_AD_TYPE FROM T_DEVICE_MAIN A INNER JOIN T_DEVICE B On A.DEVICE_CODE = B.DEVICE_CODE AND B.HIDE=0 WHERE A.AD_CODE > 0 ) C ON A.AD_CODE = C.AD_CODE
WHERE 1=1 AND A.FR_DATE <= DATEADD(MINUTE, @TIME_ZONE, @UTC_DATE) AND A.TO_DATE >= DATEADD(MINUTE, @TIME_ZONE, @UTC_DATE) AND A.FR_TIME <= CASE WHEN ISNULL( A.FR_TIME,'') = '' THEN A.FR_TIME ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(5), DATEADD(MINUTE, @TIME_ZONE, @UTC_DATE + ' ' + @UTC_TIME), 108) END AND A.TO_TIME >= CASE WHEN ISNULL( A.FR_TIME,'') = '' THEN A.TO_TIME ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(5), DATEADD(MINUTE, @TIME_ZONE, @UTC_DATE + ' ' + @UTC_TIME), 108) END AND A.STATUS =9 AND A.HIDE = 0 #[CATEGORY_CODE] #[CATEGORY_CODES] #[KEYWORD_CODE] #[KEYWORD_NAME] #[DISTANCE] GROUP BY A.AD_CODE ,A.TITLE ,A.SUB_TITLE ,B.COMPANY_NAME ,A.LOGO_URL ,A.BANNER_TYPE ,A1.AD_CODE )SELECT * FROM T_TABLE WHERE IDX > ((@PAGE -1) * @PAGE_COUNT) AND IDX <= (@PAGE * @PAGE_COUNT) SET NOCOUNT OFF
